amendment.description: Page 75, line 3, strike "and" at the end. Page 75, line 13, strike the period at the end and insert "; and". Page 75, insert after line 13 the following: ***.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Posey amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Posey amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
